participant_1.background:

participant_2.background:
My mother is a teacher.
I cook well.
I can speak three languages.
I like to bike.
I love being in nature.

content.text: Hi! I'm Sarah, and I'm a big fan of CSI. I once swam with manta rays! What's your name?
Hi Sarah, my name is Emma. I love CSI too! I've never swam with manta rays, but that sounds like an amazing experience.
It was! I was really lucky to be able to do it. What kind of work do you do?
I'm a teacher, just like my mom. I love working with kids and helping them learn.
That's great! I'm sure you're a great teacher.
Thanks! I try my best. What do you do for fun?
I love to cook, bike, and be in nature. I'm also an aspiring writer.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to cook too, but I'm not very good at it. I'm also not very good at biking, but I love doing it anyway.
I'm sure you're a better bike rider than you think! I'm not very good at writing either, but I'm trying to get better.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a great writer.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what do you want to do when you're done with school?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going to grad school, but I'm not sure what I want to study.
That's a tough decision. I'm sure you'll figure it out eventually.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what's your favorite thing to do in nature?
I love hiking and camping. I also love swimming in lakes and rivers.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been camping before, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem!
